400: Oops! It looks this app and our server are not on sync!. Please try to refresh the page and clear cache.
401: Oops! It looks like your username or password is incorrect. Please try again.
403: Oops! It looks like your user has no permissions to access this service.
404: We are sorry, but it looks our services are not online currently. Please try again later.
423: You have reached the maximum number of login attempts. Please try again later.
500: We apologize, but it looks something is wrong with our services. Please try again later.
logout: Your account was logged out successfully.
request_success: Your request has been completed successfully.
request_failed: Your request failed. Please, try again later.
request_unsuccessful: Your request failed. Please, try again later.
delete_request_success: The element has been deleted successfully.
database_integrity_violation: There seems to be an issue. Please report the next issue code: ERR_DBIV
jwt_revoked: There seems to be an issue. Please report the next issue code: ERR_JWTR
method_not_allowed: There seems to be an issue. Please report the next issue code: ERR_MTA0
ip_blocked: There seems to be an issue. Please report the next issue code: ERR_IPB0
invalid_request: There seems to be an issue. Please report the next issue code: ERR_IVR0
unsupported_media_type: Please, select a supported media type.
bad_request: There seems to be an issue. Please report the next issue code: ERR_BDR0
internal_server_error: There seems to be an issue. Please report the next issue code: ERR_ISE0
message_not_readable: There seems to be an issue. Please report the next issue code: ERR_MNR0
not_found: There seems to be an issue. Please report the next issue code: ERR_NFE0
invalid_credentials: The credentials are invalid. Please check them and try again.
email_already_exists: The email is already in use.
role_without_backend_service_role: This application/role combo has no backend roles assigned. Please, add a backend role on 'Services' view first.
email_not_sent: The email has not been sent.
role_already_exists: This role already exists or it is already assigned to the entity.
user_group_already_exists: A group with this name already exists.
user_not_in_appointment: The user is not registered in the appointment.
user_already_in_appointment: The user is already registered in this appointment.
comment_too_long: The comment is too long. Please, keep it under 10.000 characters.
error_generating_pdf: There has been an error generating the PDF.
temporal_token_does_not_exists: This token does not exist or has expired.
invalid_number_of_organizations: User must only pertain to one organization.
